sentences.en: Cultivating entrepreneurial creativity and innovation should be the greatest challenge of Singaporeans.
sentences.cn: 如何在人才培养上鼓励创意,在工作中提倡创新成为新加坡人的一大挑战.

sentences.en: Fifth, entrepreneurial spirit - pride, loyalty, devotion, dedication, unity, innovation and exert upward.
sentences.cn: 企业精神 —— 自豪 、 忠诚 、 敬业 、 奉献 、 团结 、 创新、奋发、向上.

sentences.en: It exciting, high - growth, entrepreneurial environment and a place to work.
sentences.cn: 公司的业务发展得很好, 那里有一种积极进取的工作环境,是个干事业的好地方.

sentences.en: It is not only small, entrepreneurial outfits that face this dilemma.
sentences.cn: 面临这种两难窘境的不仅是小型创业企业.

sentences.en: It took a generous helping of entrepreneurial confidence to persevere during this incident.
sentences.cn: 在这一事件中坚持下来是有了充足的创业信心的。

sentences.en: Let's see if you have the necessary entrepreneurial mindset to become self - employed.
sentences.cn: 让我们来看看你是否有准备单干必备的企业心态.

sentences.en: Many of the entrepreneurial figures connected with the earlier era had already departed.
sentences.cn: 许多与过去的年代相联系的企业家已去世.

sentences.en: Mr. Denby says his entrepreneurial spirit was fostered by Berkeley's curriculum.
sentences.cn: 邓比说,他的创业精神源自于自己在伯克利上的课程.

sentences.en: Other Requirements: An entrepreneurial attitude approach with strong communication and organizational skills.
sentences.cn: 其它要求: 具有较强的事业心,沟通和组织能力强.

sentences.en: So they've got the talent, they've got the entrepreneurial spirit.
sentences.cn: 所以,他们有才能, 他们有创业精神.

sentences.en: The success of HP's benefit to its constant entrepreneurial spirit.
sentences.cn: 惠普的成功相当程度上得益于它恒久的企业精神.

sentences.en: The types included Entrepreneurial, Academic, Teaching & amp ; Reasearch , Profession , General, Technical, Crafts etc.
sentences.cn: 这些变量的不同组合,即得出不同的高等教育机构类型:创业型 、 学术型 、 教学研究型、专业型 、 普通型 、 技术型与技能型等7小类.

sentences.en: We define the entrepreneurial way as opportunity recognition, innovation, and action.
sentences.cn: 我们确定的创业机会识别的方式, 创新, 并采取行动.

sentences.en: Welcome to passengers throughout the entrepreneurial approach, and seek common development!
sentences.cn: 热忱欢迎各地商客进场创业, 共谋发展!

sentences.en: Wine merchant Clinton Ang is being recognised for his entrepreneurial skills.
sentences.cn: 酒商ClintonAng因他创业的技能倍受肯定.

words.tran_cn: 企业家的，创业者的；中间商的

trans.tran_en: Entrepreneurial means having the qualities that are needed to succeed as an entrepreneur
